group.title: Understanding the Gatsby lifecycle with Narative
group.author: Thiago Costa, Dennis Brotzky, Brad Tiller, Mack Mansouri
group.excerpt: With the growing community interest in Gatsby, we hope to create more resources that make it easier for anyone to grasp the power of this incredible tool.
